geometry.spatial

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.spatial.Solid
      • geometry.spatial.Box

  • public class Box
extends Solid
    class modelling a solid of 6 rectangular sides

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box

        public Box(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 offset,
   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] defining,
   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] vertices,
   Rectangle[] sides)
        Parameters:
        offset - offset vector
        defining - array of exactly 3 vectors, each representing a vertex connected to offset. Thus the difference of each vector of defining and offset needs to be orthogonal to every other difference.
        vertices - vertices of box.
        sides - sides of box

    • Method Detail

        Overrides:

        Returns:

      • getBasis

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3[] getBasis()
        Returns:
        the set vectors whose unscaled linear combinations, added to the offset, yield any vertex of this box

      • getDimensions

        public float[] getDimensions()
        Returns:
        array of lengths of the sides

      • getOffset

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 getOffset()
        Returns:
        the box's offset vector

      • diagonalOffset

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 diagonalOffset()
        Returns:
        the point diagonally opposite to the offset point. Note: needs to be computed, is constructed every time anew.

      • isWithin

        Parameters:

        Returns:
